xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.1 Kusalapada » 2.5.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
77.
1416Hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
78.
1417Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1418Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1419Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1420(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup2.5.2 Akusalapada >>
